paper_abstract: A Markov chain is proposed that uses coupling from the past sampling algorithm for sampling mxn contingency tables. This method is an extension of the one proposed by Kijima and Matsui (Rand. Struct. Alg., 29:243-256, 2006). It is not polynomial, as it is based upon a recursion, and includes a rejection phase but can be used for practical purposes on small contingency tables as illustrated in a classical 4x4 example.
paper_title: Perfect sampling algorithm for small mxn contingency tables
